meanings.definition: A protein coat surrounding a virus particle.
meanings.sent1: The capsids of the virus help protect it from the environment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the structure of capsids to understand how viruses work.
meanings.sent3: The capsids of the virus were having a party inside the host cell.
meanings.sent4: The capsids acted like knights guarding the virus kingdom.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the capsids looked like tiny shells protecting the virus.

meanings.definition: The protective outer shell of a virus.
meanings.sent1: Capsids play a crucial role in keeping the virus intact.
meanings.sent2: The capsids of the virus can vary in shape and size.
meanings.sent3: The capsids decided to throw a beach party for the virus inside the cell.
meanings.sent4: The capsids shielded the virus like a fortress protecting its treasure.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the capsids made the virus stand out under the microscope.
